        public ChronicleQueueBuilder.IndexedChronicleQueueBuilder synchronous(boolean synchronous)
        Sets the synchronous mode to be used. Enabling synchronous mode means that ExcerptCommon.finish() will force a persistence every time.
        Parameters:
        synchronous - If synchronous mode should be used or not.
        Returns:
        this builder object back

        Returns:

      • cacheLineSize

        public ChronicleQueueBuilder.IndexedChronicleQueueBuilder cacheLineSize(int cacheLineSize)
        Sets the size of the index cache lines. Index caches (files) consist of fixed size lines, each line having ultiple index entries on it. This param specifies the size of such a multi entry line. Default value is 64.
        Parameters:
        cacheLineSize - the size of the cache lines making up index files
        Returns:
        this builder object back

      • cacheLineSize

        public int cacheLineSize()
        The size of the index cache lines (index caches are made up of multiple fixed length lines, each line contains multiple index entries). Default value is 64.
        Returns:
        the size of the index cache lines

      • dataBlockSize

        public ChronicleQueueBuilder.IndexedChronicleQueueBuilder dataBlockSize(int dataBlockSize)
        Sets the size to be used for data blocks. The method also has a side effect. If the data block size specified is smaller than twice the message capacity, then the message capacity will be adjusted to equal half of the new data block size.
        Parameters:
        dataBlockSize - the size of the data blocks
        Returns:
        this builder object back

      • dataBlockSize

        public int dataBlockSize()
        Returns the size of the data blocks.
        Returns:
        the size of the data blocks

      • indexBlockSize

        public ChronicleQueueBuilder.IndexedChronicleQueueBuilder indexBlockSize(int indexBlockSize)
        Sets the size to be used for index blocks. Is capped to the bigger value among 4096 and a quarter of the data block size.
        Parameters:
        indexBlockSize - the size of the index blocks
        Returns:
        this builder object back

      • indexBlockSize

        public int indexBlockSize()
        Returns the size of the index blocks.
        Returns:
        the size of the index blocks

      • messageCapacity

        public ChronicleQueueBuilder.IndexedChronicleQueueBuilder messageCapacity(int messageCapacity)
        The maximum size a message stored in a Chronicle instance can have. Defaults to 128K. Is limited by the data block size, can't be bigger than half of the data block size.
        Parameters:
        messageCapacity - the maximum message size that can be stored
        Returns:
        tthis builder object back

      • messageCapacity

        public int messageCapacity()
        The maximum size of the message that can be stored in the Chronicle instance to be configured. Defaults to 128K. Can't be bigger than half of the data block size.
        Returns:
        the maximum message size that can be stored

      • small

        public ChronicleQueueBuilder.IndexedChronicleQueueBuilder small()
        A pre-defined ChronicleBuilder for small Chronicle instances. It has the following params:
        • data block size 16M

      • medium

        public ChronicleQueueBuilder.IndexedChronicleQueueBuilder medium()
        A pre-defined ChronicleBuilder for medium Chronicle instances. It has the following params:
        • data block size 128M

        public ChronicleQueueBuilder.IndexedChronicleQueueBuilder large()
        A pre-defined ChronicleBuilder for large Chronicle instances. It has the following params:
        • data block size 512M

      • test

        public ChronicleQueueBuilder.IndexedChronicleQueueBuilder test()

        • data block size 8k
